page.title: 12Leisure and recreation
page.content: In Moretonhampstead there is one swimming pool and two playing fields. The swimming pool is open all summer and quite a few buy season tickets and usually go every day.On Friday evenings there are Brownies and after Brownies the Guides meet.At the playing fields there are lots of different clubs,cricket club,tennis club,riding club,bowling club and a BMX club.There is one tennis court at the side of the playing fields.There are a few night clubs for adults like bingo and whist drives.
